name: ShadowPunch
description:
A long time ago i made a project for a friend to help him and i decided to release it to you guys because you might find it helpful(here is a playable version and the gdevelop project files)

Controls:

computer

  use mouse to swipe in left,right,up,down

  or use a,d,w,s

  both will punch in the direction of the swipe or a=left d=right w=up s=down

mobile

  use touch to swipe in the direction left,right,up,down

 it will punch in the direction of the swipe
